choice.title: GuidoQtApplsMacOSX-2.20
choice.description: A Guido Music Notation (GMN) files editor. Provided to create GMN files for the Interlude Score Viewer.

choice.title: libmusicxml2
choice.description: A library to support the MusicXML format (required by the Guido editor and the Interlude Viewer)

locale.resource:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf1038\cocoasubrtf350 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 Verdana;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;\red255\green3\blue18;} {\*\listtable{\list\listtemplateid1\listhybrid{\listlevel\levelnfc23\levelnfcn23\leveljc0\leveljcn0\levelfollow0\levelstartat1\levelspace360\levelindent0{\*\levelmarker \{disc\}}{\leveltext\leveltemplateid1\'01\uc0\u8226 ;}{\levelnumbers;}\fi-360\li720\lin720 }{\listname ;}\listid1}} {\*\listoverridetable{\listoverride\listid1\listoverridecount0\ls1}} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\qc\pardirnatural
\f0\b\fs24 \cf0 INScore Viewer\ GRAME - Centre national de creation musicale\ http://www.grame.fr\ ______________________________________\
\b0\fs22 Copyright GRAME (c) 2009-2010 \b\fs24 \ \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\b0 \cf0 \ \ \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\b \cf0 General information \b0 \
\b __________________________________________\ \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\b0 \cf0 The INScore Viewer provides augmented music score capabilities. An augmented score is a graphic space that provides representation, composition and manipulation of heterogeneous music objects, both in the graphic and time domains. \ It supports arbitrary resources like music scores, images, \ text, vectorial graphics and signals representations. \ It focuses on the graphic synchronization of its components, according to their time relations and on signals representation.\ \ The INScore Viewer has no user interface, it is intended to be controled via OSC messages i.e. by any external application that supports the OSC protocol (typically MaxMSP or Pure Data). A set of Max patches is included in the distribution as examples. They require MaxMSP version 5.\ \ \ \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\b \cf0 Content \b0 \
\b __________________________________________\ \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\b0 \cf0 This distribution includes :\ \pard\tx220\tx720\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\li720\fi-720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural \ls1\ilvl0\cf0 {\listtext \'95 }INScoreViewer.app : a stand alone augmented scores viewer. \ {\listtext \'95 }Max : a folder containing Max patches provided as example of use of the INScore OSC API.\ {\listtext \'95 }GuidoQtApplsMacOSX-2.20 : a music score editor supporting the Guido Music Notation format.\ {\listtext \'95 }libmusicxml2.framework : a library to support the MusicXML format. \ \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural \cf0 \ \ \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\i\b \cf2 Warning \i0\b0 \cf0 \ \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\b \cf0 __________________________________________\ \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\b0 \cf0 The INScoreViewer is currently under development and will evolve with future versions. The main of the OSC API should be considered as stable, however there is no warranty concerning changes that could break the compatibility with previous versions.\ In particular, the format of the mapping files and strings will change with a future version to become consistent with the current segmentation specifications.\ \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\b \cf0 __________________________________________\ \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\i\b0\fs22 \cf0 The INScoreViewer is developed in the framework of the Interlude project and is supported by the ANR [ANR-08-CORD-010] \i0\fs24 \ }
